title: Skint Katie Price slashes prices on her kids' clothing range

Katie Price has been flogging clothes from her kids' ranges for less than half price as she's on the brink of bankruptcy again.

The former glamour model and mum-of-five launched the boutique in April and named it after two of her sons Junior and Jett.

After six months in, Katie has completely slashed prices by 50 percent amid her bankruptcy issues.

And the outcome means that some of the items have been dropped by as much as £15, while others are being sold for just £4.

The website, juniorandjett.co.uk, currently has 60 items of clothing and 33 pieces reduced on the site.

(Image: Instagram)

As an extra treat to her fans, Katie is offering a 20 percent discount on top of the massive reductions.

A collection of tracksuits are in Pricey's bargain collection, and she uses her sons to model the clothes.

Junior, 14, whose dad is Peter Andre, and Jett, six, fathered to Kieran Hayler, model the clothes.

(Image: Instagram)

It doesn't stop skint Katie regularly posting photos of the range on Instagram , although it reportedly angers ex Peter Andre.

It comes as the reality star could be made bankrupt by Christmas after allegedly failing to keep up with her monthly payments.

The star is being pursued by creditors and entered into a Individual Voluntary Agreement over her estimated £250,000 debts to the High Court.

Katie was recently dumped by toyboy lover Charles Drury, 22.

Since the end of their relationship, builder Charles has made a string of explosive statements about his and Katie's brief courtship.

Charles claims that on the first night they met, they binged on drugs and drink before sleeping together hours later in a cocaine-fuelled romp.

(Image: Youtube)

He also believes she cheated on him during their fling, but she would never admit to it.

Their relationship came to an end when Charles saw pictures of her leaving Kris' house.

Katie previously admitted to taking cocaine weekly for six months as she struggled to cope with her mum's terminal illness and ex husband Kieran's cheating.

(Image: Youtube)

She had checked into rehab and was treated for trauma and depression.

Mirror Online have contacted a representative for Katie for comment.
description: Some of the items on Pricey's website have been dropped by as much as £15, while others are being sold for just £4
